plan.description: Test the ability to search for emails containing the keyword 'meeting' in the inbox of the mobile email application.

subgoals.target_element: email app icon on home screen
subgoals.expected_outcome: The email application launches and displays the inbox view.
subgoals.verification_criteria: Verify that the inbox is displayed and the title shows 'Inbox'.

subgoals.description: Locate the search bar in the inbox
subgoals.target_element: search bar at the top of the inbox
subgoals.expected_outcome: The search bar is highlighted and ready for input.
subgoals.verification_criteria: Verify that the search bar is visible and enabled.

subgoals.description: Input the keyword 'meeting' into the search bar
subgoals.expected_outcome: The keyword 'meeting' appears in the search bar.
subgoals.verification_criteria: Verify that the search bar contains the text 'meeting'.

subgoals.target_element: search button next to search bar
subgoals.expected_outcome: The search results for 'meeting' are displayed.
subgoals.verification_criteria: Verify that the results screen shows emails containing 'meeting'.

subgoals.description: Verify the search results contain relevant emails
subgoals.target_element: list of emails in search results
subgoals.expected_outcome: The list displays emails that contain the keyword 'meeting'.
subgoals.verification_criteria: Check each email subject/preview to confirm it includes 'meeting'.

subgoals.description: Check for the presence of a 'No results found' message if no emails exist
subgoals.expected_outcome: Display a message indicating no results found if applicable.
subgoals.verification_criteria: Verify that 'No results found' message is displayed when no emails contain 'meeting'.

plan.success_criteria: The test is successful if the search operation returns relevant emails or a 'No results found' message is displayed appropriately.

supervisor_analysis.overall_assessment: The test episode demonstrated a strong performance in execution and verification with high success rates. However, planning could benefit from additional scenario coverage.
prompt_improvement_suggestions: planner: Create prompts that focus on edge case scenarios and error handling.
executor: Encourage recording execution logs for detailed analysis.
verifier: Suggest verifying performance alongside functionality.
plan_quality_feedback: Include more detailed prompts for edge case scenarios.
Encourage the planner to think about ‘what if’ scenarios.
execution_quality_feedback: Implement logging for execution steps to trace back in case of future errors.
verification_quality_feedback: Consider validating performance metrics alongside functional verifications.
recommended_test_expansions: Add tests for error conditions and negative scenarios.
strengths: Well-structured test plan with clear objectives.
